ualberta.g12.adventurecreator

Class StoryController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ualberta.g12.adventurecreator.StoryController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SController

    public class StoryController
extends java.lang.Object
implements SController
    Controller for the stories that deal with the information regarding stories in the application. Controls the ability to add or edit the title and author of the stories, as well as add fragments to a selected story.
